Html:
Hi there,

I am running KIGG under VS2008. My problem is that I can't publish stories. I am able to submit a new story. I can see it under New and Upcoming Stories, but I don't know how to make it publishable or publish it.

Any help would be appreciated.

Thanks

fromano2802

A story needs to be for 4 hours (I think you can change the time in web.config) in Upcoming before you can publish it.
After this time you can publish stories by using Publish link in the Admin panel.

Thank you for the answer Pawlos,

I just didn't know why I could not publish the stories. I'll check the web.config to see if I can change the time.

Cheers
